    <script>
        // Tab switching functionality
        const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn');
        const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');
        
        tabButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Remove active class from all buttons and contents
                tabButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                    btn.classList.add('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                });
                tabContents.forEach(content => {
                    content.classList.remove('active');
                });
                
                // Add active class to clicked button and corresponding content
                button.classList.remove('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                button.classList.add('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                const tabId = button.getAttribute('data-tab');
                document.getElementById(`${tabId}-tab`).classList.add('active');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice cloning toggle
        const enableVoiceCloning = document.getElementById('enable-voice-cloning');
        const voiceCloningOptions = document.getElementById('voice-cloning-options');
        
        enableVoiceCloning.addEventListener('change', () => {
            if (enableVoiceCloning.checked) {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.remove('hidden');
            } else {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.add('hidden');
            }
        });
        
        // Character card selection
        const characterCards = document.querySelectorAll('.character-card');
        characterCards.forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, you'd have more sophisticated selection logic
                characterCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500'));
                card.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice style buttons
        const voiceStyleButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.voice-style-btn');
        voiceStyleButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, this would set the voice style
                voiceStyleButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
                });
                button.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
            });
        });
        
        // Generate button simulation
        const generateBtn = document.getElementById('generate-btn');
        const progressFill = document.getElementById('generation-progress');
        const progressPercentage = document.getElementById('progress-percentage');
        
        generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            // Simulate generation progress
            let progress = 0;
            generateBtn.disabled = true;
            generateBtn.textContent = 'Generating...';
            generateBtn.classList.add('opacity-75');
            
            const interval = setInterval(() => {
                progress += Math.random() * 10;
                if (progress > 100) progress = 100;
                
                progressFill.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                progressPercentage.textContent = `${Math.round(progress)}%`;
                
                if (progress === 100) {
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        generateBtn.disabled = false;
                        generateBtn.textContent = 'Generate Video';
                        generateBtn.classList.remove('opacity-75');
                        
                        // In a real app, you'd update the video preview here
                        document.getElementById('video-preview-placeholder').innerHTML = `
                            <div class="bg-black h-full w-full flex items-center justify-center">
                                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-16 w-16 text-white" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M14.752 11.168l-3.197-2.132A1 1 0 0010 9.87v4.263a1 1 0 001.555.832l3.197-2.132a1 1 0 000-1.664z" />
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z" />
                                </svg>
                                <span class="sr-only">Generated video placeholder</span>
                            </div>
                        `;
                        
                        // Initialize audio waveform for the demo
                        initDemoWaveform();
                    }, 500);
                }
            }, 300);
        });
        
        // Initialize a demo waveform (in a real app, this would be the actual audio)
        function initDemoWaveform() {
            const wavesurfer = WaveSurfer.create({
                container: '#voice-waveform',
                waveColor: '#3b82f6',
                progressColor: '#2563eb',
                cursorColor: '#1d4ed8',
                barWidth: 2,
                barRadius: 3,
                cursorWidth: 1,
                height: 60,
                barGap: 2,
                responsive: true
            });
            
            // Load a demo audio (this would be the generated audio in a real app)
            wavesurfer.load('https://www.soundhelix.com/examples/mp3/SoundHelix-Song-1.mp3');
            
            // Play button functionality
            const playAudioBtn = document.getElementById('play-audio-btn');
            playAudioBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                if (wavesurfer.isPlaying()) {
                    wavesurfer.pause();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15.536 8.464a5 5 0 010 7.072m2.828-9.9a9 9 0 010 12.728M5.586 15.536a3 5 0 010-7.072" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Play</span>
                    `;
                } else {
                    wavesurfer.play();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M5.586 15H4a1 1 0 01-1-1v-4a1 1 0 011-1h1.586l4.707-4.707C10.923 3.663 12 4.109 12 5v14c0 .891-1.077 1.337-1.707.707L5.586 15z" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Pause</span>
                    `;
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Download buttons (simulated)
        document.getElementById('download-audio-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated audio file.');
        });
        
        document.getElementById('download-video-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated video file.');
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <script>
        // Tab switching functionality
        const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn');
        const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');
        
        tabButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Remove active class from all buttons and contents
                tabButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                    btn.classList.add('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                });
                tabContents.forEach(content => {
                    content.classList.remove('active');
                });
                
                // Add active class to clicked button and corresponding content
                button.classList.remove('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                button.classList.add('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                const tabId = button.getAttribute('data-tab');
                document.getElementById(`${tabId}-tab`).classList.add('active');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice cloning toggle
        const enableVoiceCloning = document.getElementById('enable-voice-cloning');
        const voiceCloningOptions = document.getElementById('voice-cloning-options');
        
        enableVoiceCloning.addEventListener('change', () => {
            if (enableVoiceCloning.checked) {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.remove('hidden');
            } else {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.add('hidden');
            }
        });
        
        // Character card selection
        const characterCards = document.querySelectorAll('.character-card');
        characterCards.forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, you'd have more sophisticated selection logic
                characterCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500'));
                card.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice style buttons
        const voiceStyleButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.voice-style-btn');
        voiceStyleButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, this would set the voice style
                voiceStyleButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
                });
                button.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
            });
        });
        
        // Generate button simulation
        const generateBtn = document.getElementById('generate-btn');
        const progressFill = document.getElementById('generation-progress');
        const progressPercentage = document.getElementById('progress-percentage');
        
        generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            // Simulate generation progress
            let progress = 0;
            generateBtn.disabled = true;
            generateBtn.textContent = 'Generating...';
            generateBtn.classList.add('opacity-75');
            
            const interval = setInterval(() => {
                progress += Math.random() * 10;
                if (progress > 100) progress = 100;
                
                progressFill.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                progressPercentage.textContent = `${Math.round(progress)}%`;
                
                if (progress === 100) {
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        generateBtn.disabled = false;
                        generateBtn.textContent = 'Generate Video';
                        generateBtn.classList.remove('opacity-75');
                        
                        // In a real app, you'd update the video preview here
                        document.getElementById('video-preview-placeholder').innerHTML = `
                            <div class="bg-black h-full w-full flex items-center justify-center">
                                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-16 w-16 text-white" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M14.752 11.168l-3.197-2.132A1 1 0 0010 9.87v4.263a1 1 0 001.555.832l3.197-2.132a1 1 0 000-1.664z" />
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z" />
                                </svg>
                                <span class="sr-only">Generated video placeholder</span>
                            </div>
                        `;
                        
                        // Initialize audio waveform for the demo
                        initDemoWaveform();
                    }, 500);
                }
            }, 300);
        });
        
        // Initialize a demo waveform (in a real app, this would be the actual audio)
        function initDemoWaveform() {
            const wavesurfer = WaveSurfer.create({
                container: '#voice-waveform',
                waveColor: '#3b82f6',
                progressColor: '#2563eb',
                cursorColor: '#1d4ed8',
                barWidth: 2,
                barRadius: 3,
                cursorWidth: 1,
                height: 60,
                barGap: 2,
                responsive: true
            });
            
            // Load a demo audio (this would be the generated audio in a real app)
            wavesurfer.load('https://www.soundhelix.com/examples/mp3/SoundHelix-Song-1.mp3');
            
            // Play button functionality
            const playAudioBtn = document.getElementById('play-audio-btn');
            playAudioBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                if (wavesurfer.isPlaying()) {
                    wavesurfer.pause();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15.536 8.464a5 5 0 010 7.072m2.828-9.9a9 9 0 010 12.728M5.586 15.536a3 5 0 010-7.072" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Play</span>
                    `;
                } else {
                    wavesurfer.play();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M5.586 15H4a1 1 0 01-1-1v-4a1 1 0 011-1h1.586l4.707-4.707C10.923 3.663 12 4.109 12 5v14c0 .891-1.077 1.337-1.707.707L5.586 15z" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Pause</span>
                    `;
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Download buttons (simulated)
        document.getElementById('download-audio-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated audio file.');
        });
        
        document.getElementById('download-video-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated video file.');
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

    <script>
        // Tab switching functionality
        const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn');
        const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');
        
        tabButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Remove active class from all buttons and contents
                tabButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                    btn.classList.add('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                });
                tabContents.forEach(content => {
                    content.classList.remove('active');
                });
                
                // Add active class to clicked button and corresponding content
                button.classList.remove('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                button.classList.add('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                const tabId = button.getAttribute('data-tab');
                document.getElementById(`${tabId}-tab`).classList.add('active');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice cloning toggle
        const enableVoiceCloning = document.getElementById('enable-voice-cloning');
        const voiceCloningOptions = document.getElementById('voice-cloning-options');
        
        enableVoiceCloning.addEventListener('change', () => {
            if (enableVoiceCloning.checked) {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.remove('hidden');
            } else {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.add('hidden');
            }
        });
        
        // Character card selection
        const characterCards = document.querySelectorAll('.character-card');
        characterCards.forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, you'd have more sophisticated selection logic
                characterCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500'));
                card.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice style buttons
        const voiceStyleButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.voice-style-btn');
        voiceStyleButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, this would set the voice style
                voiceStyleButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
                });
                button.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
            });
        });
        
        // Generate button simulation
        const generateBtn = document.getElementById('generate-btn');
        const progressFill = document.getElementById('generation-progress');
        const progressPercentage = document.getElementById('progress-percentage');
        
        generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            // Simulate generation progress
            let progress = 0;
            generateBtn.disabled = true;
            generateBtn.innerHTML = '<span class="flex items-center">Generating...<svg class="animate-spin ml-2 h-5 w-5 text-white" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle class="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4"></circle><path class="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path></svg></span>';
            generateBtn.classList.add('opacity-75');
            
            const interval = setInterval(() => {
                progress += Math.random() * 10;
                if (progress > 100) progress = 100;
                
                progressFill.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                progressPercentage.textContent = `${Math.round(progress)}%`;
                
                if (progress === 100) {
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        generateBtn.disabled = false;
                        generateBtn.textContent = 'Generate Video';
                        generateBtn.classList.remove('opacity-75');
                        
                        // In a real app, you'd update the video preview here
                        document.getElementById('video-preview-placeholder').innerHTML = `
                            <div class="bg-black h-full w-full flex items-center justify-center">
                                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-16 w-16 text-white" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M14.752 11.168l-3.197-2.132A1 1 0 0010 9.87v4.263a1 1 0 001.555.832l3.197-2.132a1 1 0 000-1.664z" />
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z" />
                                </svg>
                                <span class="sr-only">Generated video placeholder</span>
                            </div>
                        `;
                        
                        // Initialize audio waveform for the demo
                        initDemoWaveform();
                    }, 500);
                }
            }, 300);
        });
        
        // Initialize a demo waveform (in a real app, this would be the actual audio)
        function initDemoWaveform() {
            const wavesurfer = WaveSurfer.create({
                container: '#voice-waveform',
                waveColor: '#3b82f6',
                progressColor: '#2563eb',
                cursorColor: '#1d4ed8',
                barWidth: 2,
                barRadius: 3,
                cursorWidth: 1,
                height: 60,
                barGap: 2,
                responsive: true
            });
            
            // Load a demo audio (this would be the generated audio in a real app)
            // Use a more reliable demo audio URL
            wavesurfer.load('https://actions.google.com/sounds/v1/alarms/beep_short.ogg');
            
            // Play button functionality
            const playAudioBtn = document.getElementById('play-audio-btn');
            playAudioBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                if (wavesurfer.isPlaying()) {
                    wavesurfer.pause();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15.536 8.464a5 5 0 010 7.072m2.828-9.9a9 9 0 010 12.728M5.586 15.536a3 5 0 010-7.072" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Play</span>
                    `;
                } else {
                    wavesurfer.play();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M5.586 15H4a1 1 0 01-1-1v-4a1 1 0 011-1h1.586l4.707-4.707C10.923 3.663 12 4.109 12 5v14c0 .891-1.077 1.337-1.707.707L5.586 15z" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Pause</span>
                    `;
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Download buttons (simulated)
        document.getElementById('download-audio-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated audio file.');
        });
        
        document.getElementById('download-video-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated video file.');
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

2. Create a GitHub repository
3. Enable GitHub Pages in the repo settings
4. Push your code

Key GitHub-specific recommendations:
- Use relative paths for any local assets
- Keep external CDN dependencies (like Tailwind)
- The demo audio URL may need to be hosted on GitHub or another reliable source

    <script>
        // Tab switching functionality
        const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn');
        const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');
        
        tabButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Remove active class from all buttons and contents
                tabButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                    btn.classList.add('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                });
                tabContents.forEach(content => {
                    content.classList.remove('active');
                });
                
                // Add active class to clicked button and corresponding content
                button.classList.remove('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                button.classList.add('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                const tabId = button.getAttribute('data-tab');
                document.getElementById(`${tabId}-tab`).classList.add('active');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice cloning toggle
        const enableVoiceCloning = document.getElementById('enable-voice-cloning');
        const voiceCloningOptions = document.getElementById('voice-cloning-options');
        
        enableVoiceCloning.addEventListener('change', () => {
            if (enableVoiceCloning.checked) {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.remove('hidden');
            } else {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.add('hidden');
            }
        });
        
        // Character card selection
        const characterCards = document.querySelectorAll('.character-card');
        characterCards.forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, you'd have more sophisticated selection logic
                characterCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500'));
                card.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice style buttons
        const voiceStyleButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.voice-style-btn');
        voiceStyleButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, this would set the voice style
                voiceStyleButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
                });
                button.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
            });
        });
        
        // Generate button simulation
        const generateBtn = document.getElementById('generate-btn');
        const progressFill = document.getElementById('generation-progress');
        const progressPercentage = document.getElementById('progress-percentage');
        
        generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            // Simulate generation progress
            let progress = 0;
            generateBtn.disabled = true;
            generateBtn.innerHTML = '<span class="flex items-center">Generating...<svg class="animate-spin ml-2 h-5 w-5 text-white" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle class="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4"></circle><path class="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path></svg></span>';
            generateBtn.classList.add('opacity-75');
            
            const interval = setInterval(() => {
                progress += Math.random() * 10;
                if (progress > 100) progress = 100;
                
                progressFill.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                progressPercentage.textContent = `${Math.round(progress)}%`;
                
                if (progress === 100) {
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        generateBtn.disabled = false;
                        generateBtn.textContent = 'Generate Video';
                        generateBtn.classList.remove('opacity-75');
                        
                        // In a real app, you'd update the video preview here
                        document.getElementById('video-preview-placeholder').innerHTML = `
                            <div class="bg-black h-full w-full flex items-center justify-center">
                                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-16 w-16 text-white" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M14.752 11.168l-3.197-2.132A1 1 0 0010 9.87v4.263a1 1 0 001.555.832l3.197-2.132a1 1 0 000-1.664z" />
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z" />
                                </svg>
                                <span class="sr-only">Generated video placeholder</span>
                            </div>
                        `;
                        
                        // Initialize audio waveform for the demo
                        initDemoWaveform();
                    }, 500);
                }
            }, 300);
        });
        
        // Initialize a demo waveform (in a real app, this would be the actual audio)
        function initDemoWaveform() {
            const wavesurfer = WaveSurfer.create({
                container: '#voice-waveform',
                waveColor: '#3b82f6',
                progressColor: '#2563eb',
                cursorColor: '#1d4ed8',
                barWidth: 2,
                barRadius: 3,
                cursorWidth: 1,
                height: 60,
                barGap: 2,
                responsive: true
            });
            
            // Load a demo audio (this would be the generated audio in a real app)
            // Use a more reliable demo audio URL
            wavesurfer.load('https://actions.google.com/sounds/v1/alarms/beep_short.ogg'); // Replace with your actual audio API endpoint
            
            // Play button functionality
            const playAudioBtn = document.getElementById('play-audio-btn');
            playAudioBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                if (wavesurfer.isPlaying()) {
                    wavesurfer.pause();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15.536 8.464a5 5 0 010 7.072m2.828-9.9a9 9 0 010 12.728M5.586 15.536a3 5 0 010-7.072" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Play</span>
                    `;
                } else {
                    wavesurfer.play();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M5.586 15H4a1 1 0 01-1-1v-4a1 1 0 011-1h1.586l4.707-4.707C10.923 3.663 12 4.109 12 5v14c0 .891-1.077 1.337-1.707.707L5.586 15z" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Pause</span>
                    `;
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Download buttons (simulated)
        document.getElementById('download-audio-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated audio file.');
        });
        
        document.getElementById('download-video-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated video file.');
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <script>
        // Tab switching functionality
        const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn');
        const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');
        
        tabButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Remove active class from all buttons and contents
                tabButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                    btn.classList.add('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                });
                tabContents.forEach(content => {
                    content.classList.remove('active');
                });
                
                // Add active class to clicked button and corresponding content
                button.classList.remove('text-gray-500', 'hover:text-gray-700');
                button.classList.add('border-b-2', 'border-blue-500', 'text-blue-600');
                const tabId = button.getAttribute('data-tab');
                document.getElementById(`${tabId}-tab`).classList.add('active');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice cloning toggle
        const enableVoiceCloning = document.getElementById('enable-voice-cloning');
        const voiceCloningOptions = document.getElementById('voice-cloning-options');
        
        enableVoiceCloning.addEventListener('change', () => {
            if (enableVoiceCloning.checked) {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.remove('hidden');
            } else {
                voiceCloningOptions.classList.add('hidden');
            }
        });
        
        // Character card selection
        const characterCards = document.querySelectorAll('.character-card');
        characterCards.forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, you'd have more sophisticated selection logic
                characterCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500'));
                card.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500');
            });
        });
        
        // Voice style buttons
        const voiceStyleButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.voice-style-btn');
        voiceStyleButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // In a real app, this would set the voice style
                voiceStyleButtons.forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.remove('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
                });
                button.classList.add('ring-2', 'ring-blue-500', 'ring-offset-2');
            });
        });
        
        // Generate button simulation
        const generateBtn = document.getElementById('generate-btn');
        const progressFill = document.getElementById('generation-progress');
        const progressPercentage = document.getElementById('progress-percentage');
        
        generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            // Simulate generation progress
            let progress = 0;
            generateBtn.disabled = true;
            generateBtn.innerHTML = '<span class="flex items-center">Generating...<svg class="animate-spin ml-2 h-5 w-5 text-white" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle class="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4"></circle><path class="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path></svg></span>';
            generateBtn.classList.add('opacity-75');
            
            const interval = setInterval(() => {
                progress += Math.random() * 10;
                if (progress > 100) progress = 100;
                
                progressFill.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                progressPercentage.textContent = `${Math.round(progress)}%`;
                
                if (progress === 100) {
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        generateBtn.disabled = false;
                        generateBtn.textContent = 'Generate Video';
                        generateBtn.classList.remove('opacity-75');
                        
                        // In a real app, you'd update the video preview here
                        document.getElementById('video-preview-placeholder').innerHTML = `
                            <div class="bg-black h-full w-full flex items-center justify-center">
                                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-16 w-16 text-white" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M14.752 11.168l-3.197-2.132A1 1 0 0010 9.87v4.263a1 1 0 001.555.832l3.197-2.132a1 1 0 000-1.664z" />
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z" />
                                </svg>
                                <span class="sr-only">Generated video placeholder</span>
                            </div>
                        `;
                        
                        // Initialize audio waveform for the demo
                        initDemoWaveform();
                    }, 500);
                }
            }, 300);
        });
        
        // Initialize a demo waveform (in a real app, this would be the actual audio)
        function initDemoWaveform() {
            const wavesurfer = WaveSurfer.create({
                container: '#voice-waveform',
                waveColor: '#3b82f6',
                progressColor: '#2563eb',
                cursorColor: '#1d4ed8',
                barWidth: 2,
                barRadius: 3,
                cursorWidth: 1,
                height: 60,
                barGap: 2,
                responsive: true
            });
            
            // Load a demo audio (this would be the generated audio in a real app)
            // Use a more reliable demo audio URL
            wavesurfer.load('https://actions.google.com/sounds/v1/alarms/beep_short.ogg'); // Replace with your actual audio API endpoint
            
            // Play button functionality
            const playAudioBtn = document.getElementById('play-audio-btn');
            playAudioBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                if (wavesurfer.isPlaying()) {
                    wavesurfer.pause();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15.536 8.464a5 5 0 010 7.072m2.828-9.9a9 9 0 010 12.728M5.586 15.536a3 5 0 010-7.072" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Play</span>
                    `;
                } else {
                    wavesurfer.play();
                    playAudioBtn.innerHTML = `
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M5.586 15H4a1 1 0 01-1-1v-4a1 1 0 011-1h1.586l4.707-4.707C10.923 3.663 12 4.109 12 5v14c0 .891-1.077 1.337-1.707.707L5.586 15z" />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Pause</span>
                    `;
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Download buttons (simulated)
        document.getElementById('download-audio-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated audio file.');
        });
        
        document.getElementById('download-video-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            alert('In a real application, this would download the generated video file.');
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
